level.text: 101.1 The Authority shall continuously maintain in the District of Columbia aegistered office at such place as may be designated by the Board of Directorsthe Board). The principal office of the Authority shall be in the District ofolumbia, at such address as may from time to time be designated by the Board.he Authority may also have offices at such other places as the Board may fromime to time designate.
101.2 The Authority shall continuously maintain within the District of Columbia registered agent, which shall be designated by the Board.

level.heading: SOURCE
